.anchor.description: Mutate the anchor field of bevy_sprite::sprite::Sprite

.color.description: Mutate the color field of bevy_sprite::sprite::Sprite

.custom_size.description: Mutate the custom_size field of bevy_sprite::sprite::Sprite
.custom_size.note: For Option fields: pass the value directly to set Some, null to set None

.custom_size.x.description: Mutate the x component of custom_size (type: f32)

.custom_size.y.description: Mutate the y component of custom_size (type: f32)

.flip_x.description: Mutate the flip_x field of bevy_sprite::sprite::Sprite

.flip_y.description: Mutate the flip_y field of bevy_sprite::sprite::Sprite

.image.description: Mutate the image field of bevy_sprite::sprite::Sprite

.image_mode.description: Mutate the image_mode field of bevy_sprite::sprite::Sprite

.rect.description: Mutate the rect field of bevy_sprite::sprite::Sprite
.rect.note: For Option fields: pass the value directly to set Some, null to set None

.texture_atlas.description: Mutate the texture_atlas field of bevy_sprite::sprite::Sprite
.texture_atlas.note: For Option fields: pass the value directly to set Some, null to set None
